name: Cool bullet-hell about a mimic
description:
Apparently I did something wrong and the game doesn't really work right now , I think I know how to fix it but I cant resubmit during the jam voting

I made a cutscene describing the plot but the game kind of broke it so watch it here instead

Controls: 

Space to start and to shoot

WASD or arrow keys to move

Assets used:

Crowd cheer

Rock texture

Have a good day
